title: Phew! Woman Finds Pet Dog's 'Nose' On The Floor, Realises Later It Was Just A Toy
text:
For someone who is not a dog person, taking care of it all by themselves can be a bit of challenge. But things took a weird turn for this woman who was baby sitting her mother's pet dog in Coventry, West Midlands. She was shocked when she spotted a "nose" lying on the floor.

Facebook

Jade Murray was playing with her dog Lenny when she noticed something on the floor. "I had a closer look only to discover what was his nose that had fallen off and was just lying there on the floor," Murray wrote on Facebook.

She decided to investigate and let the pet out of her room. She panicked so much at the thought of her pet dog's nose just lying there on the floor.

"I started freaking out thinking he’s never going to sniff p**s again on his walks and I know he loves doing that, I was thinking he must be in pain, I was also thinking how on earth am I going to tell my mum that whilst in my care - the dogs nose has managed to fall off."

Don't Miss 16.1 K SHARES 13.9 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 4.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES

She then gathered the courage to actually pick "the nose" up. That's when she realised that it belonged to a toy. Lenny had bitten it off while playing with his chewy toy that lay on the floor.

"Anyway, I eventually plucked up the courage to pick it up because I thought nah surely not, this cannot be..only to then realise he’s bitten the nose off one of his soft toys and his nose still remains," she added.

The Facebook post, which was shared on Tuesday, has gone viral. It has garnered over 2.28 lakh likes, more than one lakh shared. Thousands of netizens have flooded the comments section. Here are some of the reactions:

A user wrote, "Omg I would have panicked so bad I would have fainted." While another added, "What a scare, can laugh about it now." Some people also suggested that Murray could have also pranked her mother with the same.
description: For someone who is not a dog person, taking care of it all by themselves can be a bit of challenge. But things took a weird turn for this woman who was baby sitting her mother's pet dog in Coventry, West Midlands. She was shocked when she spotted a nose.
